49795.summary: Some customers in the Mill Lake and South Poplar  area of Abbotsford are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
49795.title: May 22 - Abbotsford (Mill Lake & South Poplar) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
